item.title: Configure Logstash, Elasticsearch, and Kibana with Docker
item.description: It was a long time ago I wanted to write this post and show you how to set up a docker-compose with all you need to have a separate logging system. Logging is a meaningful way to monitor your applicationâ€™s behavior. When it comes to production and having multiple servers running one application in different instances, You might want to have a unified logging system to check them all in one place.
